trans-unit.source: Represents a cell in the rendered table of a tabular ASP.NET data-bound control, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma célula na tabela composta de um controlo de vinculados a dados em tabela do ASP.NET, tal como <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlFieldCell class is a strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> class that represents a cell in ASP.NET data-bound controls that render their contents in a tabular layout, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataControlFieldCell é uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>classe que representa uma célula numa controlos vinculados a dados ASP.NET que os respetivos conteúdos um esquema de tabela, como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> de composição</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> de tipo seguro

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object that contains the DataControlFieldCell object controls how the cell is rendered by applying styles to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objeto que contém o objeto de DataControlFieldCell controla a forma como a célula é composta aplicando estilos à célula.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: You can access the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell.ContainingField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder a contendo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objeto utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell.ContainingField%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell.ContainingField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object as the cell's container.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> classe, definição especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objeto como contentor da célula.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName> element defined by its base class to render the cell.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor utiliza o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName>elemento definido pela respetiva classe base para compor na célula.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object passed in the `containingField` parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objeto transmitido a `containingField` parâmetro é utilizado para determinar se deve mostrar cabeçalhos e que estilos a aplicar à célula quando é composto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> que contém a célula actual.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object as the cell's container.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> classe, definição especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objeto como contentor da célula.

trans-unit.source: The `tagKey` parameter is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> base class constructor, and controls the HTML tag that is emitted by the control.
trans-unit.target: O `tagKey` parâmetro é passado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>base construtor de classe e a etiqueta de controlos de HTML que é emitida pelo controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> passed in the `containingField` parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>transmitido a `containingField` parâmetro é utilizado para determinar se deve mostrar cabeçalhos e que estilos a aplicar à célula quando é composto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> that specifies the HTML tag to render for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> que especifica a tag HTML para compor para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The default tag used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> class is <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta predefinida utilizada pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> classe é <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> que contém a célula actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objeto que contém a célula actual.

trans-unit.source: The content rendering for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object might be affected by the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> properties of the containing field, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A composição do conteúdo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objeto poderão ser afetado por vários <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>campo de propriedades de que o contém, tais como <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> that contains the current cell, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> is passed to the class constructor.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> que contém a célula actual, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se nenhuma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> é transmitido a este construtor de classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control validates client input.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o controlo valida a entrada de cliente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control validates client input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo valida a entrada de cliente; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
